name: Lama Zone Gard Spit Party
description:
Revenge is a dish best spat cold

In Lama Zone Gard Spit Party (LZGSP), play a llama who wants to avenge his family slained by ruthless rich people by spitting on as much people as you possibly can. EXPLORE the mansion, ORGANIZE it with the items and SPIT on the guests.


EXPLORE

ORGANIZESPIT

Xbox Controls : 

  • Left Stick to Move
  • Right Stick to Rotate
  • Start to Pause/Validate in Menu
  • LB to interact
  • RB to Spit

Keyboard Controls :

  • WASD/ZQSD to Move
  • Mouse Movement to Rotate
  • Escape to Pause/Validate in Menu
  • Right Click to Interact
  • Left Click to Spit

TEAM :
Valerian Dubois - Programming/Game Design/Sound Design
Adrien Louineau - 3D Modeling/Texturing/Lighting/Shading
Clement Romanet - Game Design/VFX/Level Design/SFX
Elise Saro - 3D Modeling/Concept Art
Sebastien Teixeira - Programming/Game Design

Additional Voices : Tracy Barale, Alexandre Castro, Laurie Combrouze & Cassandra Mesa
